paper_abstract: Recently, the minimum Hamming weights of negacyclic and cyclic codes of length p(s) over a finite field of characteristic p are determined in [4]. We show that the minimum Hamming weights of such codes can also be obtained immediately using the results of [1].
paper_title: A NOTE ON NEGACYCLIC AND CYCLIC CODES OF LENGTH p(s) OVER A FINITE FIELD OF CHARACTERISTIC p
